headline: FirstEnergy PA Gets Approval for Infrastructure Improvement Plans
summary: FE Pennsylvania receives approval to implement phase three of its LTIIP. It will focus on improving service reliability through grid modernization and system resiliency.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy PA Gets Approval for Infrastructure Improvement Plans

headline: 3 Utility Stocks to Stabilize Your Portfolio Before Year-End
summary: PCG, ETR and NJR are gaining from the rate declines. Courtesy of their systematic investments, they will serve customers efficiently and are expected to continue strong performance in 2025.
